# ManipulationComponent.Dynamics.RotationBehavior

**Structure**

Definition of different standardized rotation behaviors for an object.

## Declaration

```swift
struct RotationBehavior
```

## Type Properties

- **none**: No active rotation behavior.
- **unconstrained**: Rotation is unconstrained in all axes.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype

items.description: Rotation is unconstrained in all axes.
items.name: unconstrained
